usecaseFold.heading: Move Fast. Stay in Control.
usecaseFold.description: Add customers, close deals, grow revenue—without adding chaos to your operations
usecaseFold.businessTagline: Over 1000 businesses trust Effortless to streamline their processes and save 400+ hours monthly

serviceContent.title: The Startup
serviceContent.description: If you're building a startup, this probably sounds way too familiar…

topImagecards.title: We're growing, but cash keeps getting stuck.
topImagecards.description: You're stuck chasing payments instead of chasing new customers. Cash stays locked up, growth gets delayed.

topImagecards.title: I have no real-time view of our burn or cash position.
topImagecards.description: Reconciliation, missed entries, calls to CA, and manual follow-ups—your team burns out, and you still don't know your actual numbers.

topImagecards.title: GST, TDS, and filings take up way too much headspace.
topImagecards.description: One missed deadline or mismatch, and you're hit with fines, notices, or vendor issues. It's not worth the stress, but here we are.

topImagecards.title: Our ops are duct-taped together with Excel and WhatsApp.
topImagecards.description: How much do we have in the bank? "Who's paid, who hasn't?" You ask these questions too often—and get answers too late.

topImagecards.title: I feel like I need to be a CA just to run the business.
topImagecards.description: ERP here, spreadsheet there, bills on email, payments on WhatsApp. You're managing a business like it's 2010.

topImagecards.title: We can't scale ops without scaling the mess.
topImagecards.description: Every new order, customer, or hire adds more spreadsheets, approvals, and manual work. Growth feels like more weight—not more momentum.

serviceContent.title: Smart Automation,
serviceContent.description: From raising invoices to capturing expenses and reconciling bank data, Effortless does the grunt work—so your team can move fast, stay lean, and stay fundraise-ready.

featuresBanner.title: Streamline Your Distribution Network—Effortlessly
featuresBanner.description: From invoice to collection, automate the entire sales finance cycle so you get paid quicker and keep your cash flowing.
features: Sync stock, sales, and receivables in real-time
Automate price updates and order adjustments for error-free operations
Instant performance insights with a centralized dashboard
Real-time alerts for stockouts, low movement, and pricing discrepancies
Faster operations = smoother sales and better revenue flow

featuresBanner.title: Spend Smarter, Pay Faster, Without the Chaos
featuresBanner.description: Streamline approvals, track every expense, and pay vendors on time—without drowning in WhatsApp threads and Excel.
features: Auto-capture bills from Gmail or camera
Pay vendors, bills, and teams with full visibility
Track project-level costs without manual entry
Keep your team focused on business, not backend

featuresBanner.title: Know What's Really Driving Growth
featuresBanner.description: See burn, margins, and cash position in real-time—so you can make smarter decisions, faster.
features: Live dashboards for runway, margins, and P&L
Drill down by product, location, or business unit
Always ready for due diligence or investor updates

serviceContent.title: What You Unlock
serviceContent.description: You didn't start your company to chase payments, fight spreadsheets, or stress about GST filings. Effortless gives you the control, speed, and freedom to focus on growth. Here's what startups across India are already unlocking:

useCaseSection.title: Faster Cash In = More Fuel to Grow
solution: Reduce your Days Sales Outstanding (DSO) with automated follow-ups, WhatsApp nudges, and real-time receivables tracking.
Send invoices in seconds, raise e-way bills instantly, and collect payments faster—without sales teams doing manual follow-ups.
Unlock working capital stuck in overdue invoices and use that cash to reinvest in growth.

useCaseSection.title: More Time for Growth, Not Bookkeeping
solution: Cut finance ops time by up to 50% with one-click reconciliation, automated GST/TDS filings, and seamless Tally sync.
Eliminate Excel file back-and-forth, WhatsApp approvals, and email chains with smart workflows and automated reports.
Free up your team to work on sales, product, and strategy—not backend firefighting.

useCaseSection.title: Smarter, Faster Decisions—Without Waiting for Month-End
solution: Get real-time dashboards showing burn rate, cash runway, margins, and profitability by business unit, customer, or SKU.
No more delays in decision-making because you're "waiting on reports." Everything is live, and at your fingertips.
Impress investors, build trust with board members, and run monthly reviews on clean, auto-generated MIS.

useCaseSection.title: No More "Let Me Get Back to You With the Numbers."
solution: Effortlessly monitor your company's burn rate, cash runway, revenue, and profit margins in real time, so you're always in control of your financial health without digging through spreadsheets.
Generate export-ready financial statements like balance sheets, profit and loss, cash flow, and MIS reports within seconds—perfectly formatted for investor decks, reviews, and board meetings.
Be always due-diligence ready with clean, organized records, fully automated GST and TDS filings, and accurate, error-free reconciliations that ensure compliance and audit-readiness.

serviceContent.title: Pick the Plan That
serviceContent.description: Choose the plan that works best for your business. All plans include core features with different limits.

packageItems: E-Invoicing and eWay Bill on Mobile and Desktop

E-Invoicing and eWay Bill (Up to 5000 Invoices)

E-Invoicing and eWay Bill (Up to 10000 Invoices)
Anti-Fraud Measures for Tracking Salesperson Productivity
Unlimited E-Invoicing and eWay Bill on Mobile and Desktop
Reimbursement Module (INR 150 per Month Per User)

serviceContent.title: Built for Startups,
serviceContent.description: Here's what customers say about Effortless

testimonials.name: S. Swaminathan
testimonials.review: Managing the entire business through an app is incredibly convenient and efficient. While the initial setup took some time—especially for tasks like setting up business accounts and integrating with GST portals—it was made much easier with the support of a skilled accountant who ensured everything was done smoothly and accurately.

testimonials.name: S.Saravanan Sundaramoothy
testimonials.review: As a startup founder, Effortless has greatly simplified managing our finances. The invoicing and collection features have optimized our cash flow, while the team ensures we stay fully compliant with GST and TDS, letting us focus on scaling the business.

testimonials.name: Hari Shankar
testimonials.review: Effortless is a true, unified solution for business finance. With a strong product and a strong team, Effortless really gives me the experience I was looking for when I was using other tools and services. Effortless helps me worry less about finance and compliance and gives me more time to focus on building the company.

serviceContent.title: Ready to Experience
serviceContent.description: Step into a world of smooth, effortless financial management
